title: Financial News - Just How Entrenched Is Putin in Global Markets?
description: Putin's enemy number one Bill Browder on the reputational vs financial impact of companies leaving Russia, the influence of rich Russian oligarchs on global companies and the outlook for geopolitics, energy policy and beyond.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
